data.name: HeaderGeneral
data.comment: General header used when at some site {0} string, pre-formatted percentage of completion {1} int, count of confirmed relic towers {2} int, count of potential relic towers {3} int, count of confirmed POI {4} total count of potential POI

data.name: HeaderNeedRelicTowerHeading
data.comment: Header shown when we need the heading of relic towers

data.name: HeaderNeedRelicTowers
data.value: Нужно {0} азимутов на башни с реликвией
data.comment: Header shown when we need the headings of more relic towers {0} int, the count of towers needed to be measured

data.name: HeaderRuinsComplete
data.comment: Header shown when the Ruins has been fully surveyed {0} int, the index of the site

data.name: HeaderStructureComplete
data.comment: Header shown when the Strcture has been fully surveyed {0} string, the type of the site, eg: Stickyhand, Hammerbot (not localized)

data.name: HeadingSite
data.comment: Fragment used to show site heading {0} int, the heading of a site in degrees

data.name: HeadingUnknown
data.comment: Fragment used when the site heading is not known

data.name: IdentifyNoMap
data.comment: Message shown when we have no map for a site type {0} string, the type of the size
data.source: ■ Note: there is no map yet for: {0}

data.name: IdentifySiteHeading
data.value:
Нужен азимут объекта:
■ Чтобы использовать текущий азимут, выполните следующие действия: - Два раза переключите режим кабины - Отправьте сообщение: .heading
■ Или отправьте сообщение: <азимут>
data.comment: Message shown when we need to identify the heading of a site
data.source:
Need site heading:
■ To use current heading either: - Toggle cockpit mode twice - Send message: .heading
■ Or send message: <degrees>

data.name: IdentifySiteType
data.comment: Message shown when a Ruins site type has not been identified {0} string, localized name for Alpha {1} string, localized name for Beta {2} string, localized name for Gamma

data.name: IdentifyWithButtress
data.comment: Suffix appended to IdentifySiteHeading, when we need to align with some buttress

data.name: IdentifyWithPort
data.comment: Suffix appended to IdentifySiteHeading, when we need to align with the data port

data.name: NoMapForType
data.comment: Footer shown when there is no background map for some site type {0} string, the type of site

data.name: ObliskFooter
data.comment: Footer when moving around a site near some obelisk {0} string, the name of some obelisk, eg: "M22" {1} string, a formatted distance in meters

data.name: RuinsFooter
data.comment: Footer shown when moving around a Ruins {0} string, the name of the current body {1} int, site number {2} string, type of ruins, eg: Alpha, Beta or Gamma (localized)

data.name: StructureFooter
data.comment: Footer shown when moving around a Structure {0} string, the name of the current body {1} string, type of ruins, eg: Stickyhand, Hammerbot (not localized)

data.name: TrackLeft
data.comment: Used in "TrackOriginHeaderSuffix" when turning left

data.name: TrackOriginFooter
data.comment: Footer shown when in aerial assistance mode {0} int, current ship altitude in meters {1} int, the desired altitude they should reach

data.name: TrackOriginHeaderPrefix
data.comment: Header prefix shown when in aerial assistance mode {0} int, current site heading

data.name: TrackOriginHeaderSuffix
data.comment: Header suffix shown when in aerial assistance mode {0} string, a direction: "left" or "right" {1} int, how many degrees to rotate in that direction

data.name: TrackRight
data.comment: Used in "TrackOriginHeaderSuffix" when turning right

data.name: ZoomLevel
data.comment: Zoom level shown top right {0} float, 1 decimal place: the zoom level, eg: 1.5

data.name: ZoomLevelAuto
data.comment: Suffix shown after ZoomLevel when zoom level is set automatically
